bug.author: efrancis59
bug.summary: InvalidPathException on "colon" character in a windows path
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
I'm trying to launch the SentimentAnalysis example. But I get an exception generated by SimpleVocabulary.Builder that tries to use the vocabulary path containing a "C:" prefix. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
This class is expected to work under windows also. <denchmark-h:h3>Error Message</denchmark-h>
Exception in thread "main" java.nio.file.InvalidPathException: Illegal char <:> at index 2: /C:/Users/xyz/.djl.ai/cache/repo/model/nlp/sentiment_analysis/ai/djl/pytorch/distilbert/distilbert/sst/0.0.1/distilbert-base-uncased-finetuned-sst-2-english-vocab.txt at java.base/sun.nio.fs.WindowsPathParser.normalize(WindowsPathParser.java:182) at java.base/sun.nio.fs.WindowsPathParser.parse(WindowsPathParser.java:153) at java.base/sun.nio.fs.WindowsPathParser.parse(WindowsPathParser.java:77) at java.base/sun.nio.fs.WindowsPath.parse(WindowsPath.java:92) at java.base/sun.nio.fs.WindowsFileSystem.getPath(WindowsFileSystem.java:229) at java.base/java.nio.file.Path.of(Path.java:147) at java.base/java.nio.file.Paths.get(Paths.java:69) at ai.djl.modality.nlp.SimpleVocabulary$Builder.addFromTextFile(SimpleVocabulary.java:219) at ai.djl.pytorch.zoo.nlp.sentimentanalysis.PtDistilBertTranslator.prepare(PtDistilBertTranslator.java:55) at ai.djl.inference.Predictor.batchPredict(Predictor.java:148) at ai.djl.inference.Predictor.predict(Predictor.java:128) at com.et.ai.SentimentAnalysis.predict(SentimentAnalysis.java:64) at com.et.ai.SentimentAnalysis.main(SentimentAnalysis.java:45) <denchmark-h:h2>How to Reproduce?</denchmark-h>
Just try to launch a copy of the SentimentAnalysis class under windows. The used djl version is 0.9.
